did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Historical Collections, Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, University of Virginia
did.unittitle: The Claude Moore Health Sciences Library Glass Plate Negative Collection, circa 1920-1935
did.physdesc: 1 box with the dimensions of 7.5 inches x 5.5 inches x 10.5 inches

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Claude Moore Health Sciences Library Glass Plate Negative Collection, Accession #MS-56, Historical Collections, Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, University of Virginia, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Transferred from the University of Virginia Medical Center Marketing Department to the University of Virginia Claude Moore Health Sciences Library circa 2000-2010.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 29 glass plate negatives illustrating various architectural aspects of the University of Virginia Medical Center and School of Medicine circa 1920-1935, including major hospital renovations and additions.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are arranged according to their original order at the time of their accession to the University of Virginia Claude Moore Health Sciences Library.
